page.title: 06A DAY IN A FORESTERS LIFE
page.content: The forestry manager has got eleven men working for him and he gets some of his men to plant trees.His men plant about half an acre a month.He and his men chop down about 1000 trees in a month.The tallest tree he has grown is called a wellingtonia.It is 100ft. tall.It takes 60 years for a tree to grow.The trees he grows mostly are pine trees.He gets the trees from a nursery,sometimes from Kelso which is local but sometimes he sends away as far as Inverness.Trees rot because disease gets in the stumps of the trees and through the roots.He chops four hundred christmas trees down for people in Ford Etal and Crookham each year.
